author: Thiago Teixeira
title: Fix docker host-mode bug by removing port randomization, and re-joining the client and browser HTTP servers. The bug was: when two containers ran in host mode in the same instance, they would accidentally share the same proxy. To go around this bug, now the user can specify a single proxy port by hand which will apply to both the client and the browser.

author: Thiago Teixeira
title: Fix docker host-mode bug by removing port randomization, and re-joining the client and browser HTTP servers. The bug was: when two containers ran in host mode in the same instance, they would accidentally share the same proxy. To go around this bug, now the user can specify a single proxy port by hand which will apply to both the client and the browser.
